verses.verse: A Psalm of David. The earth <S%H776><s%> is Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s, and the fulness <S%H4393><s%> thereof <S%H8398><s%>; The world, and they that dwell therein <S%H3427><s%>.
For he hath founded <S%H3245><s%> it upon the seas <S%H3220><s%>, And established <S%H3559><s%> it upon the floods <S%H5104><s%>.
Who shall ascend <S%H5927><s%> into the hill <S%H2022><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>? And who shall stand <S%H6965><s%> in his holy <S%H6944><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>?

He that hath clean <S%H5355><s%> hands <S%H3709><s%>, and a pure <S%H1249><s%> heart <S%H3824><s%>; Who hath not lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%> unto falsehood <S%H7723><s%>, And hath not sworn <S%H7650><s%> deceitfully <S%H4820><s%>.
He shall receive <S%H5375><s%> a blessing <S%H1293><s%> from Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, And righteousness <S%H6666><s%> from the God <S%H430><s%> of his salvation <S%H3468><s%>.
This is the generation <S%H1755><s%> of them that seek <S%H1875><s%> after him <S%H1245><s%>, That seek thy face <S%H6440><s%>, even Jacob <S%H3290><s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah

Lift up <S%H5375><s%> your heads <S%H7218><s%>, O ye gates <S%H8179><s%>; And be ye lifted up <S%H5375><s%>, ye everlasting <S%H5769><s%> doors <S%H6607><s%>: And the King <S%H4428><s%> of glory <S%H3519><s%> will come in <S%H935><s%>.
Who is the King <S%H4428><s%> of glory <S%H3519><s%>? Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> strong <S%H5808><s%> and mighty <S%H5808><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> mighty <S%H5808><s%> in battle <S%H4421><s%>.

Lift up <S%H5375><s%> your heads <S%H7218><s%>, O ye gates <S%H8179><s%>; Yea <S%H5375><s%>, lift them up, ye everlasting <S%H5769><s%> doors <S%H6607><s%>: And the King <S%H4428><s%> of glory <S%H3519><s%> will come in <S%H935><s%>.
Who is this King <S%H4428><s%> of glory <S%H3519><s%>? Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, He is the King <S%H4428><s%> of glory <S%H3519><s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
